TopicTitle: Help! All my hotkeys stopped working!? (Plenty of battery)

Articles.Content: Did I click something? Esc still brings up the menu, items on the screen are still clickable, just that no hotkeys do anything - can't turn on or off SAS, can't adjust thrust. I have plenty of battery power? Confused.
did you turn off warp ? (sorry only thing i can think about for the moment)
Wow - I can only recommend checking to make sure they are still bound, and just shut down and reboot. All else fails - try a reinstall - just backup your saved games first!
My guess is you were in 5x time warp. Happens to me all the time.
